subject: Travel
title: Leif Erikson Reaches America
description: A short lesson to help you apply Leif Erikson Reaches America.

hook.text: Five hundred years before Columbus, a Viking landed on North American shores.

buildup.text: Leif Erikson sailed west from Greenland around 1000 AD following stories of a distant land.

discovery.text: He found a place with wild grapes and mild weather. He called it Vinland.

twist.text: For centuries, historians dismissed the story as myth. Then archaeologists found Viking ruins in Canada.

climax.text: L'Anse aux Meadows in Newfoundland confirmed Vikings reached America around 1000 AD.
